Sentencas: A single-step gas phase process, based on a liquid-fed flame spray synthesis (FSS) technique is presented, which allows a precise control of particle size and particle stoichiometry for the processing of nanostructured cathode layers.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Crystalline La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta nanopowders, two mixed ionic-electronically conducting perovskite compositions for intermediate temperature cathodes were synthesised from aqueous solutions of cost-effective nitrates with production rates up to 400 g h(-1).
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By controlling the processing parameters, a specific surface area (SSA) of 12-48 m(2)g(-1) corresponding to Brunauer-Emmett-Teller (BET) equivalent particle diameter from 20-100 nm were synthesised.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The influence of process parameters like production rate and solvent composition on size, morphology, crystal structure and phase purity were investigated by BET, high resolution electron microscopy (HR-TEM), energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS) and X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Dilatometry was used to determine the thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) and shrinkage behaviour as a function of particle size.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A pronounced shift towards lower temperatures for the onset of shrinkage is observed for the nanoscale materials.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical performance and degradation was analysed by conductivity measurements as well as thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) under different atmospheres.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: CO, was identified as a critical parameter in terms of carbonate formation from Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta and causes a strong increase in the material resistivity, whereas La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta is unaffected.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The oxygen exchange kinetic of both compositions is affected by CO2 containing atmospheres.
Titulo: Flame Spray Synthesis of Nanoscale La0.65Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ and Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ as Cathode Materials for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
